mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( article_id, reply_pid, user_id, responder, `time`, content) VALUES (#{command.articleId},#{command.replyPid},#{command.userId},#{command.responder},#{command.time},#{command.content})
mapper.select: SELECT id, article_id AS articleId, reply_pid AS replyPid, user_id AS userId, responder, `time`, content FROM reply WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND data_status = 1
